title: Game will not launch, says : PVP.net Patcer Kernel has stopped working
body:
[URL=http://s42.photobucket.com/user/Brewpub/media/LOL%20error%20code_zpslbwsknyl.png.html][IMG]http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e320/Brewpub/LOL%20error%20code_zpslbwsknyl.png[/IMG][/URL]

It was working fine a few days ago but then started to crash 

I am running Windows 10 and have a Core I7

thanks

replies.body: Try running League as an admin, since it can often throw out these errors if it's not operating with the right permissions. Simply right-click on the shortcut and select *run as administrator*. Let me know if this resolved the issue!
